---
id: describe-users
title: "DescribeUsers"
description: "This API allows you to query the basic status of users in a Room, including whether the User is in the Room, the User's role, the time when the User logged into the Room, etc."
api: 
info_path: core_products/real-time-voice-video/en/server/api-reference/room/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>DescribeUsers</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


This API allows you to query the basic status of users in a Room, including whether the User is in the Room, the User's role, the time when the User logged into the Room, etc.

<Note title="Rate Limit">All Rooms under the same AppID: 10 times/second</Note>

## Request

When there are no Users in the Room, the Room will be automatically destroyed by the server.</li>\n          <li>2. When there is only one User in the Room, if that User leaves or is kicked out of the Room, the Room will be automatically destroyed by the server.</li>\n          <li>3. When a User's heartbeat request times out after 100 seconds, the User will be disconnected; after all Users are no longer in the Room, the Room will be automatically destroyed by the server.</li>\n This type of User mainly exists in scenarios such as cloud recording and audio/video Stream review. The User-related interfaces of the client SDK will filter out this type of User.\n\n**This return parameter is only meaningful when accessing the LiveRoom service. Please ignore this parameter when accessing the Express service.**\n"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"Code\": 0,\n  \"Message\": \"string\",\n  \"RequestId\": \"string\",\n  \"Data\": {\n    \"UserStatusList\": [\n      {\n        \"UserId\": \"string\",\n        \"Status\": 0,\n        \"LoginTime\": 0,\n        \"UserRole\": 0\n      }\n    ]\n  }\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example"} value={"Example"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"Code\": 0,\n  \"Data\": {\n    \"UserStatusList\": [\n      {\n        \"UserId\": \"a\",\n        \"Status\": 1,\n        \"LoginTime\": 1675674019365,\n        \"UserRole\": 1\n      },\n      {\n        \"UserId\": \"b\",\n        \"Status\": 1,\n        \"LoginTime\": 1675674019455,\n        \"UserRole\": 1\n      }\n    ]\n  },\n  \"Message\": \"success\",\n  \"RequestId\": \"TestRequestId1675674022729915000\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
